sentences.en: A spiral deformation occured in the lower part of the young leaf enclosed in the sheath.
sentences.cn: 在叶鞘裹住的幼叶下部呈现螺旋状.

sentences.en: Arrows point to the defect in the rectus sheath.
sentences.cn: 箭头指示腹直肌鞘缺损.

sentences.en: Both root and root cap are covered by a sheath - like structure called the coleorhiza.
sentences.cn: 根和根冠被一鞘 状 结构,即胚根鞘所覆盖.

sentences.en: Conclusion Saber sheath trachea is a sign of rather severe COPD.
sentences.cn: 结论剑鞘气管是较重的copd的标志.

sentences.en: Each stay is composed of 25 - 5 / 8 in diameter Dywidag bars encased in a metal sheath.
sentences.cn: 每根拉索由25根直径为5/8英寸(16毫米)的迪威达格式粗钢筋组成,拉索套在金属套管内.

sentences.en: Georgos retrieved the knife and returned it to the sheath.
sentences.cn: 乔戈斯用力把刀抽了出来,插回刀鞘.

sentences.en: He drew his sword from its sheath.
He lowered it and drew his hunting - knife from its beaded sheath at his hip.
sentences.cn: 他放下枪,从屁股后面的镶珠刀鞘里拔出猎刀.

sentences.en: He was not ready to sheath all his weapons.
sentences.cn: 他并不准备从此刀枪入库,马放南山.

sentences.en: He wiped the knife and put it back in the sheath.
sentences.cn: 他擦干净刀子,放入鞘内.

sentences.en: His sword was back in its sheath.
Objective To study nursing experience of pulling out sheath operation.
sentences.cn: 目的:探讨冠心病介入治疗术后拔除血管鞘的护理经验.

sentences.en: Put the dagger back in its sheath.
the sheath around an electric cable
This suit of clothing is more inexpensive than that sheath.
To draw from or as if from a sheath or scabbard.
sentences.cn: 拔出从剑鞘或枪套中或仿佛从剑鞘或枪套中拔出.

words.tran_cn: 覆盖的；封装的；装有护套的
使入鞘；为…备鞘；覆盖（sheathe的过去分词）
鞘；[电]护套；叶鞘；女子紧身服装

trans.tran_en: a cover for the blade of a knife or sword
